selection_reasoning: Stuck at local optimum of 2.6310 (gap: 0.005 to optimal). Gen 2 had 50% failure rate due to Opus formatting issues and timeouts. Key learnings: (1) Use gemini-flash or sonnet instead of opus for code generation - fewer formatting errors, (2) Need fundamentally different approaches to escape this local optimum, (3) Consider: the optimal configuration may have qualitatively different structure - perhaps asymmetric or with very different circle sizes. Next gen should try: completely different initializations, looking up known configurations for n=26, and ensemble methods.
